sn1.10:4.2: Standing to one side, that deity addressed the Buddha in verse:
sn1.10:5.3: eat just one meal a day:
sn1.10:5.4: so why is their complexion so clear?”
sn1.10:6.2: nor do they long for the future;
sn1.10:6.3: feeding on whatever comes in the present day,
sn1.10:6.4: that’s why their complexion is so clear.
sn1.10:7.1: Because they long for the future,
sn1.10:7.4: like a green reed mowed down.”
